Title: Anti-crisis shield: Employment protection and wage subsidies
Subcategory: Income support for people in employment (e.g. short-time work)

Title: Sick leave allowance for people returning from abroad and their household members under quarantine
Anti-crisis shield: Deferral of social security contributions for self-employed and micro companies
Measures supporting solo self-employed and freelancers
Subcategory: Extensions of income support to workers not covered by any kind of protection scheme

Title: Compensation for employees looking after children or disabled persons while in quarantine
Subcategory: Support for parents and carers (financial or in kind)

Title: Social partners address economic challenges: Food industry and tourism
Flexible working time arrangements and introduction of less favourable working conditions
Subcategory: Change of work arrangements (working time, rota schemes)

Title: Sectoral shield: Support measures for sectors affected by lockdown measures
Care allowances for working parents forced to provide personal daycare for young children due to school/pre-school system lockdown
Subcategory: Support for parents and carers (financial or in kind)
